author: Lesley Waters
method: Heat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Blend the bread, cream, plaice, dill and egg in a food processor. Pour into a lined and greased round ramekin dish and place in a bain-marie. Bake in the oven for 8-10 minutes. For the cream, place the cream and juice in a saucepan. Bring to the boil and reduce for 1-2 minutes. Turn out onto a plate and drizzle with orange cream.
ingredients: chunk of bread,  1 plaice fillet,  handful dill,  100ml/3½fl oz double cream,  1 free-range egg,  1 orange, juice only,  100ml/3½fl oz cream
